head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WEINLES, MAX D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WEINLES, MAX D.

block.p: WEINLES-Max D. Of Scarsdale, NY, on October 30th, 2000 at the age of 85. Beloved husband of Frances. Devoted father of Roslyn and Steven, and father-in-law of Elliot. Loving brother of Sylvia Jacobs and Rae Rendelstein. Service Tuesday, 2:30 PM, at ''Riverside Memorial Chapel,'' 21 West Broad Street, Mount Vernon, New York.

WEINLES-Max D. Of Scarsdale, NY, on October 30th, 2000 at the age of 85. Beloved husband of Frances. Devoted father of Roslyn and Steven, and father-in-law of Elliot.
